price: 4. (Ese día) retornarán a Al-lah (para ser juzgados), y Él es Todopoderoso.
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
